page.title: 11KILBURN(DERBY)AREA LIFESTYLE
page.content: Written by an 11_year_old child A perfect day for me starts about 9 o'clock when I get up, get dressed and have a wash. After breakfast we make some sandwiches then jump in the car and drive off to Alton Towers. I spend the morning on the rides there, then we have our dinner. After dinner we get back in the car and go up to Black Rocks or Guliverts Kingdom. After some games and a look around, we go and buy some fish and chip. Then we speed down the road home and I go inside and watch the A_Team. My perfect day ends with a Horror Movie on the late night T.V.
